mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_NO AS seqNo, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, MNG_BRANCH_CODE AS mngBranchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, TERMINAL_TYPE AS terminalType, OVERHAUL_CORP AS overhaulCorp, OVERHAUL_EMP_NAME AS overhaulEmpName, INSPECTION_EMP_NAME AS inspectionEmpName, INSPECTION_CORP AS inspectionCorp, OVERHAUL_GUBUN AS overhaulGubun, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, OVERHAUL_START_TIME AS overhaulStartTime, OVERHAUL_END_TIME AS overhaulEndTime, OVERHAUL_HANDLE_CONTENT AS overhaulHandleContent, INSPECTION_OPINION AS inspectionOpinion FROM ATMS_04001140

SELECT SEQ_NO AS seqNo, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, MNG_BRANCH_CODE AS mngBranchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, TERMINAL_TYPE AS terminalType, OVERHAUL_CORP AS overhaulCorp, OVERHAUL_EMP_NAME AS overhaulEmpName, INSPECTION_EMP_NAME AS inspectionEmpName, INSPECTION_CORP AS inspectionCorp, OVERHAUL_GUBUN AS overhaulGubun, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, OVERHAUL_START_TIME AS overhaulStartTime, OVERHAUL_END_TIME AS overhaulEndTime, OVERHAUL_HANDLE_CONTENT AS overhaulHandleContent, INSPECTION_OPINION AS inspectionOpinion FROM ATMS_04001140 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_04001140 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}

UPDATE ATMS_04001140 SET SEQ_NO = #{seqNo}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, MNG_BRANCH_CODE = #{mngBranchCode}, TERMINAL_TYPE = #{terminalType}, OVERHAUL_CORP = #{overhaulCorp}, OVERHAUL_EMP_NAME = #{overhaulEmpName}, INSPECTION_EMP_NAME = #{inspectionEmpName}, INSPECTION_CORP = #{inspectionCorp}, OVERHAUL_GUBUN = #{overhaulGubun}, OVERHAUL_START_TIME = #{overhaulStartTime}, OVERHAUL_END_TIME = #{overhaulEndTime}, OVERHAUL_HANDLE_CONTENT = #{overhaulHandleContent}, INSPECTION_OPINION = #{inspectionOpinion} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}

INSERT INTO ATMS_04001140 ( SEQ_NO, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, MNG_BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, TERMINAL_TYPE, OVERHAUL_CORP, OVERHAUL_EMP_NAME, INSPECTION_EMP_NAME, INSPECTION_CORP, OVERHAUL_GUBUN, OVERHAUL_DATE, OVERHAUL_START_TIME, OVERHAUL_END_TIME, OVERHAUL_HANDLE_CONTENT, INSPECTION_OPINION ) VALUES ( #{seqNo}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{mngBranchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{terminalType}, #{overhaulCorp}, #{overhaulEmpName}, #{inspectionEmpName}, #{inspectionCorp}, #{overhaulGubun}, #{overhaulDate}, #{overhaulStartTime}, #{overhaulEndTime}, #{overhaulHandleContent}, #{inspectionOpinion} )
